wikipedia.title: Planet Rock
wikipedia.extract:
Planet Rock  may refer to:

"Planet Rock" (song), a 1982 song by Afrika Bambaataa and the Soulsonic Force
Planet Rock: The Album, a 1986 album containing the song
Planet Rock (radio station), DAB radio station in the United Kingdom broadcasting classic rock music

opinions.details: （All men, women, boys, and girls, hey our Planet Rock is superb. […] You're in a place where the nights are hot Where nature's children dance and set a chance On this Mother Earth, which is our rock. […] Rock rock to the Planet Rock, don't stop. […] 从上面几句歌词来分析，应该是rock修饰planet，所以“摇滚星球/行星”可能比较贴切。Netflix《Hip Hop Evolution》里是翻成星球）
总觉得“行星”这么构词有点别扭
